skins.selfIntroduction: I am Large Cruiser Azuma. I was designed to lead torpedo squadrons into night battles, but I never saw any actual combat. I'm quite good at commanding night battles, but torpedoes are another story... Ahahaha...
skins.acquisition: Large cruiser, Azuma, reporting for duty. As a special prototype ship, there are many things that I am still unfamiliar with... However, I will lay down my life to protect you, Commander. It would please me greatly if you would place your trust in me. Hehe~
skins.login: Shall we begin the day's work? Do not worry, I will be right here with you the whole time.
skins.details: I need more experience if I'm to keep up with the others... So please give me something to do. Hehehe.
skins.secretaryIdle1: This defense power will definitely be useful in battle!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My guns are very precise...? Thank you for saying so. I think it's more the result of training than any natural talent. Hehehe.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, is there something you would like from me?
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh? You want to touch me? Or would you like me to touch you? You'll have to come out and say it.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander? There's a time and a place...

skins.shipDescription: Commander? Oh, I haven't quite finished changing. My hair still needs work... Sorry, would you mind waiting a bit longer?
skins.acquisition: Commander? Oh, I haven't quite finished changing. My hair still needs work... Sorry, would you mind waiting a bit longer?
skins.login: Commander, the Spring Festival is a busy, exciting time. But do take care not to catch a cold when you're out having fun.
skins.details: E-even if it's for a picture, holding this pose all this time is not easy...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I understand these "Tangyuan" soup balls have some association with "unity" or "gathering" in the language of the Dragon Empery, but if I eat the tangyuan, doesn't that mean I've broken the unity?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Our friends are drawing that "Fu" character everywhere, so I went ahead and tried my hand. I think I did alright... Ahahaha...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Do you need help with the decorations in your office? I'd like to give decorating a try.
skins.secretaryTouch: Having you here, Commander, makes me feel at ease.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Don't do that! At least, don't do it right now...!
